column4: Hi, I want to change the default firefox settings (the home page, some bookmarks) for all new users. Is /usr/share/firefox the right place to do it? Won't a firefox upgrade overwrite my changes in there?
or should I create a default profile in /etc/skel ?
AFAIR there's a --force-all option to dpkg...
yeah, but before using that, it's a good idea to look which depenency is the problem
